content: आभास् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To shine, blaze. {@--2@} To be bright. {@--3@} To appear, seem, look like; स्थानांतरं स्वर्ग इवाबभासे <ls>Ku. 7. 3</ls>; <ls>R. 7. 43</ls>, <ls n="R. 7.">63</ls>; <ls n="R.">14. 12.</ls> {@--4@} To appear untruly, have an appearance; शुक्तिः रजतवदाभासते; <ls>Ki. 17. 21.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To illuminate.
